name: Camacho - Connecticut BXP - Robusto
additionalNotes: Camacho, the world’s leading brand of bold cigars, is back with new box-pressed (BXP) editions to its winning Connecticut, Corojo and Ecuador lines.These box-pressed beauties have been fine-tuned to offer a bolder, stronger taste experience. Camacho’s master builders have added American Broadleaf tobaccos grown in Pennsylvania to the original recipe. This introduction of Broadleaf tobaccos amplifies the aromas and boosts the overall taste experience, while box-pressing delivers a noticeably longer and cooler smoke with a more comfortable mouth feel.
